info.description: Search for information on companies using a website or company name and get access to Company Data, News, Blog Posts, Competitor Lists and much more.
info.title: Owler

get.description: The Company Basic Search API searches for a company based on the input and will returns results containing basic details about matching companies. By default the API returns the top 10 available results unless the limit is specified. The maximum limit is restricted to 30.

parameters.description: Search term
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Fields to be searched - name, website, ticker, permid. If not specfied, will be searched against all fields
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Number of results to be displayed - 10 (by default, if not specified) to 30
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

get.summary: Basic Search Company by Ticker or Website or Name or PermID

get.description: The Competitors API provides basic information about top 3 competitors of a company specified in the Company Id

parameters.description: Company Id
parameters.name: companyId

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

get.description: The Competitors API provides basic information about top 3 competitors of a company specified in the website

parameters.description: Company Id
parameters.name: website

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

get.description: The Competitors API provides basic information about all competitors of a given company Id

parameters.description: Company Id
parameters.name: companyId

parameters.description: Pass pagination_id as * in the first API request. The API response will return top competitors along with the next pagination_id which can be passed in the subsequent API request to get the next set of competitors. Repeat this process until needed or till the pagination_id returned is blank. Note:Every response will have maximum of 50 competitors.
parameters.name: pagination_id

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

get.description: The Competitors API provides basic information about all competitors of a given company Id

parameters.description: Company Id
parameters.name: website

parameters.description: Pass pagination_id as * in the first API request. The API response will return top competitors along with the next pagination_id which can be passed in the subsequent API request to get the next set of competitors. Repeat this process until needed or till the pagination_id returned is blank. Note:Every response will have maximum of 50 competitors.
parameters.name: pagination_id

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

get.description: The Company Fuzzy Search API searches for a company based on the input and will return results containing basic details about matching companies. By default the API returns at most top 10 available results unless the limit is specified. The maximum limit is restricted to 30.

parameters.description: Search term
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Fields to be searched - name, website, ticker, permid, address, phone. Each field and its corresponding value has to be specified
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: Number of results to be displayed - 10 (by default, if not specified) to 30
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

get.summary: Fuzzy Search Company by Name or Address or Phone

get.description: The Company Data API provides complete information about a company for the specified Company Id

parameters.description: Company Id
parameters.name: companyId

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Number of results to be displayed - 10 (by default, if not specified) to 30

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml

get.summary: Search Company by Ticker or Website or Name or PermID

get.summary: Get Basic Company Info by Url

get.description: The Feeds API provides a list of feeds and individual feed information for the given Company Ids and Category. By default the API returns the latest 10 feeds available unless the limit is specified. The maximum result is restricted to 100 feeds per API request.

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Company Ids separated by comma (Maximum of 150 Company Ids)
parameters.name: company_id

parameters.description: Number of results to be displayed - 10 (by default, if not specified) to 100
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Pass pagination_id as blank in the first API request. The API response will return the latest feeds along with the next pagination_id which can be passed in the subsequent API request to get the next set of feeds. Repeat this process until needed or till the pagination_id returned is blank
parameters.name: pagination_id

parameters.description: Categories separated by comma. If not specified, will search against all categories
parameters.name: category

get.summary: Get Feeds for given Company Ids

get.description: The Feeds API provides a list of feeds and individual feed information for the given Company Websites and Category. By default the API returns the latest 10 feeds available unless the limit is specified. The maximum result is restricted to 100 feeds per API request.

parameters.description: Format of the response content - json (by default if not specified), xml
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Company Websites separated by comma (Maximum of 10 Company Websites)
parameters.name: domain

parameters.description: Number of results to be displayed - 10 (by default, if not specified) to 100
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Pass pagination_id as blank in the first API request. The API response will return the latest feeds along with the next pagination_id which can be passed in the subsequent API request to get the next set of feeds. Repeat this process until needed or till the pagination_id returned is blank
parameters.name: pagination_id

parameters.description: Categories separated by comma. If not specified, will search against all categories
parameters.name: category

get.summary: Get Feeds for given Company Websites
